title.rendered: THE TIE-DYE TREND LOOKS CHIC IN SOFT PASTEL COLORS

content.rendered:
THE TIE-DYE TREND LOOKS CHIC IN SOFT PASTEL COLORS

Eyelash Extension Touch ups are a bit of a challenge during this difficult time, especially when the nation has been declared  a pandemic.  However, D’Lashes Lash spa has you covered. Just so that your not looking “Snag- A- Lash from home.  D’Lashes is now offering our Lashettes Live Virtual, Face time calls to help you touch up your remaining Extensions that are left on your eyes right about now. This way, you still feeling refreshed and looking “Lashed out” during your home stay.  Also, getting to the The Tie-Dye trend looks extra beautiful and very chic in these soft pastel colors. I know at this time we are spending so much time at home during COVID-19, but we can still add this trend to our loungewear look…and when we do go outside even if it’s for a short time. The Tie-Dye pastel trend is a great look to add during Spring especially if you’re not a fan of the floral trend.

Both looks are again from FWRD.COM. The snake earring is by Alessandra Rich. The bottom blue earrings are from Gucci. Both tie-dye shoes are by Jimmy Choo. The bottom blue bag is by Jacquemus.

Since we are spending so much time at home it’s the perfect time to unwind and relax with D’Lashes candles.  This beautiful candle is our rose gold edition and has the most amazing glow. Click the link below to shop!

P.S. Shop D’Lashes Beauty, Your One on One Live Lash Session, Candles, and A-List Strip Lashes Here. 

Wishing you all tons of love, health, and safety!

XO XO, Dionne
